Beatnik Offers Actionset Pro For Dreamweaver Free

28 Dec 1999

Beatnik is currently offering the Pro version of the Dreamweaver Actionset for free. This Actionset, normally sold for USD49.95, in the Pro version allows building complex event based sonified sites easily. If you have Dreamweaver and want to extend it's capabilities get this Actionset while the offers lasts.
